info.title: Wallet API
info.description: API for managing wallets, bank accounts, deposits, and withdrawals

Signature.name: X-Signature
Signature.description: HMAC SHA256 signature generated using the request payload and secret key.

Environment.name: X-Environment
Environment.description: Specifies the environment to use. Determines which database the API interacts with.

get.description: Retrieve all balance information for the authenticated organization

401.description: Unauthorized: Invalid or missing API key for creating a bank account.

message.example: You are not authorized to create a bank account. Please provide a valid API key.

example.message: You are not authorized to create a bank account. Please provide a valid API key.

get.description: Retrieve all wallets for the authenticated organization

401.description: Unauthorized: Invalid or missing API key for creating a transaction.

message.example: You are not authorized to create a transaction. Please provide a valid API key.

example.message: You are not authorized to create a transaction. Please provide a valid API key.

post.description: Create a new wallet for the authenticated organization

401.description: Unauthorized: Invalid or missing API key for listing transactions.

message.example: You are not authorized to list transactions. Please provide a valid API key.

value.message: You are not authorized to list transactions. Please provide a valid API key.

get.description: Retrieve a specific wallet by ID

401.description: Unauthorized: Invalid or missing API key for retrieving a transaction.

message.example: You are not authorized to retrieve this transaction. Please provide a valid API key.

value.message: You are not authorized to retrieve this transaction. Please provide a valid API key.
API key is missing in the request header.
